Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: Twitch chat command that is used to post to discord

Cooldown.label: Default Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: Default value for how long the command should go on cooldown for

Info.label: Default Users
Info.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

Permission.label: Default Permission
Permission.tooltip: Default value for who is able to use the command
